content.question: The author mentions the Latter-Day Pamphlets (Paragraph 2) primarily to

choices.label: provide an example of what is indisputably "good"
identify the book that discusses "past men and past times"
acknowledge some of the concerns held by the "plenty"
explain Carlyle's inspiration for the theory of the "'greatest man'"

content.answer: acknowledge some of the concerns held by the "plenty"

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
